scripts.generate: uv run python manage.py inspectdb > core/models.py.tmp && uv run python -c "import os; os.replace('core/models.py.tmp', 'core/models.py')" && uv run python scripts/fix_models.py
scripts.start: npm run generate && uv run python manage.py makemigrations core uploads && uv run python manage.py migrate && npm run generate && uv run python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
